EmailTemplate.name: 201809_SaveTheDate_FalconDemo_Irina.Falcon900 London
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date for our demo flight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | Business & General Aviation SAVE THE DATE! Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Madam/Sir}},
It is our pleasure to inform you that our Honeywell test plane, a state-of-the-art Falcon 900, will be available in London on October 19th to view a wide variety of Honeywell offerings and demonstrations.
This aircraft is equipped with JetWave and GoDirect™ services, as well as SmartView Synthetic Vision, CPDLC and much more.
This is a great opportunity for you to test these systems live, and we look forward to having you on board.
Precise timings will be communicated in the very near future.
CLICK HERE TO SAVE YOUR SEAT <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Falcon_Demo.html]]>
More information will follow soon.
Honeywell Aerospace Events & Sales Team
